thrash.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to move or make something move from side to side in a violent or uncontrolled way
thrash.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Salmon thrash their tails and leap from the water.
The girl was thrashing about in the water.
thrash.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to beat someone violently, especially in order to punish them
thrash.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: My poor brother used to get thrashed for all kinds of minor offences.
thrash.translation[0].definitions[2].def: to defeat someone very easily in a game
thrash.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a violent movement from side to side
thrash.translation[1].definitions[1].def: a type of loud fast rock music
